remarks: Definition of line in terms of original lattice elements.  (Contributed by NM, 29-Apr-2012.)
statement:
isline3.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
isline3.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
isline3.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
isline3.n $e |- N = ( Lines ` K ) $.
isline3.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
isline3 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( ( M ` X ) e. N <-> E. p e. A E. q e. A ( p =/= q /\ X = ( p .\/ q ) ) ) ) $.
$d A p q $.
$d B p q $.
$d K p q $.
$d M p q $.
$d X p q $.
